# isRulerVisible

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver’s enclosing scroll view shows its ruler.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isRulerVisible: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the receiver’s enclosing scroll view shows its ruler, otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Using the ruler

- **toggleRuler(_:)**: This action method shows or hides the ruler, if the receiver is enclosed in a scroll view.
